This can be redeemed online or over the phone but the customer must provide the valid unique coupon code.

- 7,000 miles with the purchase of a new system - Cannot be combined with any other offers  - Customer can email miles@simplisafe.com with their AAdvantage number and order number if they have questions about the offer or their miles.
Instructions: - customer must input their correct AAdvantage #  into the form at checkout using the dedicated URL from the marketing piece they received. Please advise customer to go to the URL they have, or if they do not have a URL, to: SimpliSafe.com/aa - Miles take 12-14 weeks from purchase date to post to accounts. - Customer can only receive miles if system is not returned within the 60 day money-back guarantee return window. - Do not advise the customer to reach out to American Airlines.
